ActJudges Act
SubjectHon. Douglas C. Campbell ** RESIGNATION AND ANNUITY **
PrecisResignation and granting of an ANNUITY to the Hon. DOUGLAS C. CAMPBELL, a Judge of the Supreme Court of Nova Scotia (Family Division), effective May 31, 2016.
AttachmentsAttachment
